overview: Mr. Kirk joined Third Security upon its inception and works with several portfolio companies of Third Security’s managed investment funds. Mr. Kirk is also involved with oversight of Third Security’s internal operations. He currently serves as Co-Chairman of the Board of Directors of IntelliMat, Inc. and as Chairman of the Board of Managers of ECDS, LLC. In 2001, he served as Vice President of Sales and Marketing for Biological & Popular Culture, Inc. In 2000, he served as interim president of SFR, LLC and then as Chief Operating Officer of Talkflow Systems, LLC. Mr. Kirk served as Marketing Manager for General Injectables & Vaccines, Inc. from 1998 to 1999. Mr. Kirk graduated as an Echols Scholar from the University of Virginia.
